text.jpText: Let's go! start!! 駆け抜けて
text.enText: Let's go! Start! Dash into the fray!
Let's make our time in this world glow

text.jpText: さぁ輝こう もっと果てしなく
text.enText: Watch! The light we create will go on for eternity

text.jpText: 始まる予感 トキメク予感信じて
text.enText: Follow your instinct\nBelieve in that feeling before a race

text.jpText: 走り出したら 止められない
text.enText: Once I dash out of the gate\nThere's no more stopping me

text.jpText: 未来の予想 あなたと一緒だったら
text.enText: When I look ahead, I see\nA path we walk together, side by side

text.jpText: どこまでだって行けそうなんだ
text.enText: Though the goalpost may be far\nWith you, I can take it in stride.

text.jpText: 自信が持てなくて弱気になる時には
text.enText: On days I feel my strength wane\nAnd my spirit begin to crumble

text.jpText: あの日の気持ち思い出そう
text.enText: I just think of that time\nOf this feeling of mine

text.jpText: また熱くなった心信じて
text.enText: And I feel my inner flame\nReady to race again

text.jpText: Let's go! start!! 駆け抜けて 今のこの時代を
text.enText: Let's go! Start! Dash into the fray!\nLet's make our time in this world glow

text.jpText: さぁ輝こう もっと果てしなく
text.enText: Watch! The light we create will go on for eternity

text.jpText: 知らない (知らない) 知りたい (知りたい) もう諦めない
text.enText: Do I believe (in me?) Can I achieve (victory?)\nSpirit unwavering

text.jpText: 期待や夢を背中に乗せ (try again)
text.enText: Hold tight those hopes and dreams as you reclaim your place (try again)

text.jpText: Let's fly high 飛び出そう 真っ直ぐ前を見て
text.enText: Let's fly high! Off we go!\nHeadfirst towards that bright skyline

text.jpText: さぁ踏み出そう最初の一歩
text.enText: Start! With these steps of ours\nAnother legend is born

text.jpText: どんな (時も) みんな (一つ) 君を待ってる
text.enText: Steadfast (we stand) Banners (in hand)\nWe're all waiting for you!

text.jpText: あの輝く夢のステージで色づくMagic
text.enText: To get up on that shining stage of your dreams, all colored in magic
